Class ServerHuman

  • java.lang.Object
    • players.Player
      • players.ServerPlayer
        • players.ServerHuman

  • public class ServerHuman
extends ServerPlayer
    The model of the player, constructed by the server.
    Author:
    Jonathan Juursema & Peter Wessels
